description:
Looks like a normal chain, but the design offers a gear range previously found only in 2-chainring drivetrains. Ultra-smooth, precise, durable and quiet, the Eagle’s links have a smooth radius, with no sharp edges or chamfers, the things that cause noise, friction and wear on your chainrings and cassette cogs. This design also allows for a flatter plate for more consistent chain riveting and greater overall strength.

  • Smooth radius links reduce friction and wear
  • Hard Chrome technology improves wear resistance on the inner links. Outer links are nickel plated
  • Powerlock chain connector for better chain guiding and longevity
  • Chrome hardened hollow pins keeps the weight low
  • 126 links
name: SRAM PC-X01 EAGLE 12 Speed Chain
